campaignevents-desc: Provides features for campaign organizers and participants.
campaignevents-error-invalid-id: The event ID must be a positive integer.
campaignevents-error-invalid-title: The event page title is invalid: $1.
campaignevents-error-invalid-title-inter: Specify an event page on the local wiki.
campaignevents-error-page-not-found: There is no event page with this name.
campaignevents-error-page-not-event-name: The event page must be in the {{ns:event}} namespace.
campaignevents-error-page-with-section: The event page must not contain a section name.
campaignevents-error-trackingtool-withou: Provide the identifier of the event on the given tracking tool.
campaignevents-error-trackingtool-eventi: Provide the identifier of the tracking tool
campaignevents-error-invalid-trackingtoo: Provide a valid tracking tool identifier
campaignevents-error-invalid-status: Indicate whether the event is open or closed.
campaignevents-error-invalid-start: The event start time is invalid.
campaignevents-error-start-past: Enter a start time in the future.
campaignevents-error-invalid-end: The event end time is invalid.
campaignevents-error-start-after-end: Enter an end date that comes after the start date.
campaignevents-error-no-meeting-type: Choose at least one event meeting type.
campaignevents-error-invalid-meeting-url: Enter a valid event meeting URL.
campaignevents-error-meeting-url-not-onl: The meeting URL must not be specified if the event is not online.
campaignevents-error-countryoraddress-no: The meeting country and address must not be specified if the event is not in-person.
campaignevents-rest-event-not-found: There is no event with this ID.
campaignevents-rest-enable-registration-: You are not allowed to enable event registrations.
campaignevents-edit-form-legend: Provide general information about the event you are organizing
campaignevents-edit-field-page-help: An event page contains information about your event. People can register as participants on the event page.
campaignevents-edit-field-chat-url-help: If you have an online chat group for the participants of this event, you can add the invite link here. Participants will be able to view the invite link after registering.
campaignevents-edit-form-notice: Only usernames will be collected from participants during registration. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:Extension:CampaignEvents/Registration Learn more].
campaignevents-edit-success-msg: The registration was edited. See [[$1|event page]].
campaignevents-enable-registration-succe: Registration is enabled. Participants can now register on the [[$1|event page]].
campaignevents-edit-event-notfound: There is no event with this ID.
campaignevents-rest-edit-page-nonlocal: This event registration was enabled on the following wiki and should be edited there: $1.
campaignevents-edit-page-nonlocal: Please [$1 edit this registration] on the wiki it was enabled on: $2.
campaignevents-edit-need-central-account: You need a central user account in order to enable or edit event registrations.
campaignevents-error-page-already-regist: The given event page already has an associated registration.
You cannot complete the action because the event registration has been deleted from this event page.
campaignevents-edit-not-allowed-registra: You are not allowed to edit this event registration.
campaignevents-enable-registration-not-a: You are not allowed to enable event registration for the given event page.
campaignevents-register-error-event-not-: There is no event with this ID.
campaignevents-register-success: You are now registered for this event.
campaignevents-register-confirmation-tex: Confirm that you want to register for this event by using the "{{int:campaignevents-register-confirmation-btn}}" button.
canceleventregistration: Cancel your registration for an event
campaignevents-unregister-success: You have canceled your event registration.
campaignevents-unregister-confirmation-t: Confirm that you want to cancel your registration for this event by using the "{{int:campaignevents-unregister-confirmation-btn}}" button.
campaignevents-delete-not-allowed-regist: You are not allowed to delete this event registration.
campaignevents-rest-delete-already-delet: This event registration is already deleted.
campaignevents-rest-user-not-found: There is no user with this central ID.
campaignevents-register-not-allowed: You are not allowed to register for events.
campaignevents-register-event-past: This event registration period has already finished.
campaignevents-register-already-particip: You are already registered for this event.
campaignevents-register-need-central-acc: You need a central user account in order to register for events.
campaignevents-unregister-not-allowed: You are not allowed to cancel your registration.
campaignevents-unregister-not-participan: You are not registered for this event.
campaignevents-unregister-need-central-a: You need a central user account in order to cancel your event registration.
campaignevents-myevents-need-central-acc: You need a central user account in order to see the list of your events.
campaignevents-eventslist-delete-dialog-: You will lose all registration data but the event page will not be deleted.
campaignevents-delete-error-event-not-fo: There is no event with this ID.
campaignevents-delete-error-already-dele: This event registration was already deleted.
campaignevents-delete-confirmation-text: Confirm that you want to delete this event registration by using the "{{int:campaignevents-delete-submit-btn}}" button. This action cannot be reverted.
campaignevents-register-registration-del: You cannot register for this event because it was deleted.
campaignevents-unregister-registration-d: You cannot cancel your event registration because it was deleted.
campaignevents-eventpage-dialog-link-not: The link will be made available by the {{PLURAL:$1|organizer|organizers}}.
campaignevents-eventpage-dialog-link-reg: Register to view the event link.
campaignevents-eventpage-dialog-venue-no: The venue address will be made available by the {{PLURAL:$1|organizer|organizers}}.
campaignevents-eventpage-dialog-chat-not: No chat group is available for this event.
campaignevents-eventpage-dialog-chat-reg: Register to view the chat group link.
campaignevents-eventpage-unregister-conf: Are you sure you want to cancel your registration?
campaignevents-eventpage-enableheader-ev: Event page: Enable registration so participants can register for your event directly on the page.
campaignevents-eventpage-enable-registra: This lets participants register to attend your event directly on this page.
campaignevents-event-details-register-pr: You need to register to see this information
campaignevents-event-details-remove-part: Are you sure you want to remove the selected {{PLURAL:$1|participant|participants}}?
campaignevents-event-details-no-particip: Usernames of participants will appear here when they register
campaignevents-event-details-not-found: There is no event with this ID.
campaignevents-event-details-online-link: The link will be made available by the {{PLURAL:$1|organizer|organizers}}.
campaignevents-event-details-venue-not-a: The venue address will be made available by the {{PLURAL:$1|organizer|organizers}}.
campaignevents-unregister-participants-p: You are not allowed to remove participants
campaignevents-unregister-participants-r: You cannot remove participants from this event because it was deleted.
campaignevents-event-details-remove-part: There was an error when trying to remove the {{PLURAL:$1|participant|participants}}
campaignevents-rest-remove-participants-: Parameter 'user_ids' must be an array of user ids, or null (to remove all users)
campaignevents-event-details-organizers-: You need to enable JavaScript in order to see the full list of organizers.
campaignevents-rest-list-participants-em: The username filter, if specified, must be a non-empty string.
campaignevents-rest-list-participants-ca: You are not authorized to view participants who registered privately for this event.
campaignevents-registration-confirmation: Private registration: Only the event organizers can see your username in the participant list.
Public registration: Show your username on a public participant list.
echo-pref-tooltip-campaign-events-notifi: Notify me when I register for an event that uses the Event Registration tool.
campaignevents-notification-registration: Join the $1 to connect with other participants and get additional updates from the organizers.
